snippet: A pilot program that combines training, intervention and prevention at a Navy base in Illinois seems to have reduced the incidence of sexual assault.
abstract: Pilot program that combines training, intervention and prevention at Navy base in Illinois seems to have reduced incidence of sexual assault; since initiative began in early 2011, reports of serious sexual assaults have dropped more than 60 percent.
lead_paragraph: A pilot program that combines training, intervention and prevention at a Navy base in Illinois seems to have reduced the incidence of sexual assault.

headline.main: At Navy Installation, Sexual Assault Prevention Begins at Boot Camp
headline.print_headline: At Navy Installation, Sexual Assault Prevention Begins at Boot Camp

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
